label: Quote must meet Government's requirements and represent best value
quote: Award will be made to the Quoter whose quote meets the Governmentâ€™s requirements and whose technical quote and price represent the best value to the Government.

label: Quoters are strongly encouraged to submit their best technical solutions and price
quote: Quoters are strongly encouraged to submit their best technical solutions and price in response to this RFQ.

label: Full and impartial consideration will be given to all quotes received
quote: Full and impartial consideration will be given to all quotes received pursuant to this solicitation, and the evaluation will be conducted in an equal manner.

label: Evaluation team will rate technical quotes in accordance with technical evaluation factors
quote: Each member of the team will evaluate each quote in accordance with the technical evaluation factors stated above to determine if the quote is acceptable.
